def_en: When a thick or sticky liquid oozes from something or when something oozes it, the liquid flows slowly and in small quantities.
If you say that someone or something oozes a quality or characteristic, or oozes with it, you mean that they show it very strongly.

def_cn: （尤指河、湖、海底的）软泥，淤泥，泥浆
def_en: You can refer to any thick, sticky, liquid substance as ooze, especially the mud at the bottom of a river, lake, or the sea.
